alert.note: Alert for Cass; White (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 06 at 1:31AM EST until March 06 at 2:15AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... White County in northwestern Indiana... Northwestern Cass County in north central Indiana... * Until 215 AM EST. * At 131 AM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Perkins to near Boswell to 10 miles northwest of Covington, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Monticello, Brookston, Wolcott, Royal Center, Reynolds, Chalmers, Burnettsville, Clymers, Badger Grove, Smithson, Golden Hill, Indiana Beach, Norway, Idaville, Sitka, Cedar Point, Bell Center and Lake Cicott. This includes Interstate 65 between mile markers 185 and 198. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
